coded_answer.p: I received your letter asking for some information about the conference.
I am glad to provide all the information.

The group has been booked into the placePalace Hotel which is near the train station. itIt is really easy to reachget to the conference from the hotel. The bus runningruns from in front of the hotel. ifIf you catch the red bus thatit will drop you in front of the conference building.
InAt the conference you should wear formal dress but you are free to choose itsthe colour or style.
At the end of the conference there will be a reseptionreception at the hotel. weWe have arranged some tours inof the city. youYou will be visitvisiting some interesting places and towers.
I look forward to seeing you.
